# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  vpat.cir vpat_step.cir vpat_step.cir.sh bad_vpat.cir bad_vpat.cir.sh bad_vpat.cir.tags bad_vpat.cir.options DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpat_step.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bad_vpat.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/bad_vpat.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bad_vpat.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bad_vpat.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VPAT/bad_vpat.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/bad_vpat.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bad_vpat.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/bad_vpat.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/bad_vpat.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bad_vpat.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bad_vpat.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VPAT/bad_vpat.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/bad_vpat.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bad_vpat.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/bad_vpat.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat.cir COMMAND ${XYCE_BINARY} vpat.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind;vpat")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP vpat.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} vpat.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VPAT/vpat.cir.prn vpat.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED vpat.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind;vpat")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat_step.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} vpat_step.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} vpat_step.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VPAT/vpat_step.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat_step.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpat_step.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat_step.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind;vpat")
endif()
